Entry.JapaneseText: <Cless>
Entry.EnglishText: <Cless>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
<Mel>
Variable
眠れないのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Can't sleep?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、うん……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, no...

Entry.JapaneseText: そう言えば、 僕の話を聞きたいって 言ってたよね
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like there's something you wish to tell me.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……だった……
Entry.EnglishText: Erm...it's just...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしたち、 ダオスに襲われたんです
Entry.EnglishText: Dhaos tried to attack us earlier.

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオスに？ また時空を越えて…… いや、そんなまさか……
Entry.EnglishText: Dhaos, you say!? Could he have travelled through time again...? No, that's impossible...

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしても、どうして ダオスに襲われるんだ。 君たちみたいな子どもが
Entry.EnglishText: Why would Dhaos attack you? You look just like regular kids.

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔王が人間襲うのに 理由なんてねんだろ
Entry.EnglishText: The Demon King is known for attacking innocent people. So nothing to worry about there, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 『魔王』か……
Entry.EnglishText: Demon King...

Entry.JapaneseText: 読んだ本には、 そう書いてあったぜ
Entry.EnglishText: That's how all the books I read refer him as.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cless>さんたちは 『魔王』を倒した 『英雄』だって
Entry.EnglishText: As Mister <Cless> and company defeated the "Demon King" they became "Heroes."

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに彼は 多くの人の命を奪った
Entry.EnglishText: But I've ended the lives of many innocent.

Entry.JapaneseText: 『魔王』と呼ばれても 仕方がないのかもしれない
Entry.EnglishText: I've done nothing different from the "Demon King."

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、それは 魔科学を排除する ためだったんだ
Entry.EnglishText: As you see, he was just trying to stop Magitechnology.

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔科学って 前に聞いたよな！？
Entry.EnglishText: Magitechnology!? We've heard that before back with <Clauss>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界のことわりを 破壊するって……
Entry.EnglishText: That's related to how the world was almost destroyed, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、ダオスは、 魔科学を……？
Entry.EnglishText: But it doesn't make sense Dhaos tried to stop Magitechnology...

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオスは人間に魔科学を やめるように言った
Entry.EnglishText: Dhaos only ever wanted the humans to stop abusing Magitechnology. He knew of its dangers.

Entry.JapaneseText: それでもその利便性を 追求する人間たちは、 魔科学をやめなかった
Entry.EnglishText: But due to the selfish interests of people Magitechnology research continued.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、ダオスは 人々を襲った……
Entry.EnglishText: Then Dhaos attacked the humans...

Entry.JapaneseText: 未だその真実は 語られないままだ
Entry.EnglishText: That is because people refused to listen to him. They would rather wage war than listen to an honest plea.

Entry.JapaneseText: 君たちがそのことを 知らないように
Entry.EnglishText: That part was concealed from history. You wouldn't have known. Mankind's ego wouldn't let it be known.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分たちがおかした罪の重さに 誰も向き合うことができないまま、 世界は前に進んでいっている
Entry.EnglishText: We've killed and sinned. However, since it was in everyone's best interests the world moved on and ignored our—my crimes.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたし、魔術を 暴走させてしまったんです
Entry.EnglishText: Mister <Cless>...It's my fault that magic has gone rampant...

Entry.JapaneseText: それがもしかしたら、 マナをたくさん使ってて、 それでダオスがわたしを……
Entry.EnglishText: The Prism Ring is consuming mana... And will destroy the world eventually. If so then Dhaos thinks I'm a threat to the world, too?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、あれは わざとと違うだろ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey but that's all wrong!

Entry.JapaneseText: わざとじゃなくても 魔術使ったのは、 わたしだもん
Entry.EnglishText: It's not wrong. All this happened because I used magic...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なるほどね
Entry.EnglishText: ...Is that so?

Entry.JapaneseText: それじゃあ、君は ダオスのされるがまま なのかい
Entry.EnglishText: But Dhaos did leave you be, didn't he?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……他に罪を償う方法が ないなら、そうしたかも しれないです……
Entry.EnglishText: ...If that's not the crime he was referring to, I'm not sure what it could be...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうならないよう ちゃんと方法見つけただろ？
Entry.EnglishText: There's nothing like that. I think you are overthinking it way too much.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかってるってば
Entry.EnglishText: I know, I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……誰が悪いとかいいとか、 人はすぐ決めたがる
Entry.EnglishText: ..."If there's evil in this world, it lurks in the hearts of men."

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、何が罪で何が正義か、 それを決めるのは 自分の心じゃないかな
Entry.EnglishText: However, what is crime and what is justice isn't something simply determined by the heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分の心？
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't determined...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分が自分の行動を 恥じるか、誇るか…… ってことですか？
Entry.EnglishText: People decide what's good or bad depending on what they're proud or ashamed of...correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……かな。 僕はダオスを倒したことを 後悔はしていない
Entry.EnglishText: ...Indeed. I used to have no regrets inside of me for defeating Dhaos.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも今でも思うんだ
Entry.EnglishText: But...I'm not so sure now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオスは滅ぼうとしていた 自分の故郷の世界樹を 生き返らせるため、戦っていた
Entry.EnglishText: Dhaos brought war and despair. But he fought to bring his home-world back to life.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分の世界を守ろうとした彼を 倒した僕たちこそが、 実は悪だったんじゃないかって
Entry.EnglishText: We were both fighting to protect our own worlds. In the end, it wasn't evil what drove him. We were the same.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……！
Entry.EnglishText: That's not true! He was attacking innocent people without any hesitation!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなことはないって、 いつも自分に言い聞かせてる
Entry.EnglishText: It wasn't. At every turn he tried to talk to us.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、この世には多くの人がいて、 善悪の基準もその人の数だけある
Entry.EnglishText: But... people's standard of what's "good" as well as their values differed.

Entry.JapaneseText: いまだに僕は 自分のやったことに 答えを出せないでいる……
Entry.EnglishText: Even now I still can't tell what would have been the right answer for that conflict...

Entry.JapaneseText: それなのに、 『英雄』だなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: And yet I'm named "hero."..

Entry.JapaneseText: ……さあ、 話はこれくらいにして
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, I believe this is enough talk for one night.

Entry.JapaneseText: もう夜も遅い。 テントに戻って休むんだ
Entry.EnglishText: Please try to rest. Return to the tent.

Entry.JapaneseText: 起きられなかったら、 置いていくよ
Entry.EnglishText: We will let you know when you need to wake up.
